title: Make a date at the Montcalm for the ttgluxury Seminar
text:
Make a date at the Montcalm for the ttgluxury Seminar 22 July 2015 
ï»¿A polar explorer will be among the speakers at the latest ttgluxury Seminar, taking place at The Montcalm in London on September 8. 
Polar explorer Christina Franco (left) and PetsPajamas chief executive Gracia Amico (right) 
Christina Franco is a global explorer who will next year attempt what no other woman has achieved before - a solo expedition to the North Pole. Franco is also director of the Voyager Programme at the new South Kensington Club. Also speaking at the conference will be Gracia Amico, chief executive of PetsPyjamas, a ground-breaking business that has seen its travel division grow dramatically since she came onboard. Previously in roles with brands such as Burberry, Hobbs and Topman, Amico also has a wealth of e-commerce and retail experience. The morning of September 8 will also see agents take part in Luxpo, the one-to-one meetings showcase. More than 25 luxury brands will be represented on the day, including 3Sixty Luxury Marketing, Antigua and Barbuda Tourism Authority, BAC Sport, Celebrity Cruises, Essential Detail, Oman Air, Shangri-La Paris, ITC Luxury Travel Group, Leeu Collection, Los Cabos Tourism Board, Palazzo Avino and Petit St Vincent, along with co-sponsor of the whole day, Gran Canaria Tourist Board.
